ValidationRule.description: Sales Reps (based on Job Name) are prevented from updating the Oppty record type from a DSA related Record type to a non DSA related Record type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId), OR($User.Job_Name__c = "Sales Representative", $Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR'), OR(PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) = "012500000000ntY", PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) ="012300000000hQf", PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) ="012500000000ltD", PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) ="0120g000000EAgt" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sales Representatives cannot change DSA related Record type to a non DSA related Record type
